title: Problem of starting game keep got disconnect about 5 mins.
body: I got a new windows 10 machine, everytime when game start I can not join the game, it appear error message see internet connection problem and you have been disconnected. I have to try to reconnect 2 to 3 times to get in the game but that make me about at least 4 level behind. Is there anyone have the same problem? Anyone has any suggestion how can I fix this problem?

replies.body: I appreciate your trying to get back in game, though it sounds like something is blocking you from reaching the game servers properly.  Since you got a new rig, it's firstly important to make sure you've updated your OS to the most recent version.  Then go over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is configured to play league smoothly.  Let me know if you have any questions!
